sense.def:
A lion
je velika, divja zver iz družine mačk, ki živi v Afriki. Take zveri imajo rumenkast kožuh, samci pa imajo na glavi in vratu košato grivo.

To get the lion's share of something
pomeni dobiti največji delež nečesa.

seg.quote: The lion's share of investment has gone to a few favoured companies.
